title: Abstract
text:
I am an observant, curious, creative, communicative and active person.
My personal values ​​include peace and respect for nature.
I enjoy exploring the world and creating my own ideas about it, therefore, my curriculum is varied and interdisciplinary.
I do projects where I can take advantage of my creativity and that keep me motivated to solve interesting problems.
